forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
